concept.title: Release 11.6.1
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.6.1 includes the following new features.

ul.li: URL Previews - URLs sent or received in a chat can now show a preview of the page that the URL represents. You can control this behavior by a new 11.6 user policy that is off by default. Your administrator will need to set policy im.urlPreviewEnabled to true.

New Scheduled Meetings View - Now you can join Sametime meetings from your calendar without ever leaving the sametime app. Tap the meetings menu and, you will see a new Scheduled list showing calendar events from your Verse and or Apple calendar. Simply, tap the event in the list to join the associated Sametime meeting, dial a conference number or open a detail view for the calendar event.

Pinned Meetings - Pinned is the new name for the Saved meetings list and, now it is much easier to add and remove meetings from the list. You can still add them manually, but you can also use swipe menus on My Meetings and Recent lists to Pin and Unpin individual meetings. To send a meeting link in a chat, tap the meeting icon in the chat window and select a meeting from the list of pinned meetings.

CarPlay Preview - With this release, we are making available the ability to join the audio portion of meetings using CarPlay. Simply use the CarPlay UI to list your My Meetings or Recents list and Start or Join meetings. You can also use CarPlay to dial into meetings that have telephony configured.

AppConfig Updates - Support for setting the URL Preview policy is added to AppConfig. We also removed some policy settings from AppConfig that you can define using the server-based user policies. For more information, see, Configuring HCL Sametime for iOS via an EMM Provider.
